title: ChatGPT API Guide
text:
This is a guide on how to access OpenAI’s API using python and the openai module. This guide will go over how to create an OpenAI account, how to get an API key, and how to access the API using said key.

Step 1: Making an Account
Start by going to platform.openai.com.

try:
    from openai import OpenAI
    import os
except ImportError as err:
    print(err)
